w :  mary was feeling on top of the world .  do you know what made her so happy ?
m :  she got good marks on her mid - term exams .

question: what are these people saying about mary ?
choice: she is pleased because she got good marks .
mary is pleased to have the mid - term exams .
mary is excited about the coming mid - term exams
answer: she is pleased because she got good marks .
